name: @retropak/schema
description: Metadata specification for Retropak software containers

scripts.build: echo 'Schema package has no build step'
scripts.validate: node --input-type=module -e "import Ajv from 'ajv'; const ajv = new Ajv(); const schema = await import('./schemas/v1/retropak.schema.json', { assert: { type: 'json' } }); const valid = ajv.compile(schema.default); console.log('Schema is valid:', valid.schema.$id);"

author: piers@retropak.org
